get.description: Get a paginated list of compravendite filtered by the provided aziende parameters

parameters.name: aziendaInserimento
parameters.description: ID of the azienda that inserted the compravendita

parameters.description: ID of the azienda that acquired the compravendita

parameters.name: aziendaVenditore
parameters.description: ID of the azienda that sold the compravendita

parameters.name: max
parameters.description: Maximum number of results per page
